items.text: good length on off stump, pushed towards long-off but extra cover cuts it off on the way
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, no run

items.text: short and just outside off. Waits late and slices it late, past point. Backward point is too square to have a chance
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, FOUR runs

items.text: good length and in at leg stump, flicked to deep square off the back foot
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, 1 run

items.text: good length on off stump, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: good length and in at leg stump, he shovels it to mid-on and steals a single. For his effort, he gets a reward. Overthrows, through extra cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, 2 runs

items.text: full and hooping in towards off stump. Taps it on the up to extra cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, no run

items.text: slower ball at off stump, flicked wide of mid-on with the cutter
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, 2 runs

items.text: short ball just outside off, cuts on the bounce to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, no run

items.text: narrowly misses off stump as Cremer looks to whip this back of a length ball through midwicket. The ball doesn't rise as much as he expects and this climbs over off stump
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, no run

items.text: back of a length at off stump, mistimed pull wide of mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, 1 run

items.text: full and drifted in at middle stump, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, 1 run

items.text: length ball pushed flat outside off. Steps out and is forced to block it with his pad after he's beaten in flight
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: beaten in flight again after stepping out. Closer to the ball this time and ends up blocking
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: length on off stump, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: lbw appeal as the bat and pad are jammed close together on the front foot defence. There was an inside edge on it, but it's unclear whether it came first
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, no run

items.text: floated up at off stump, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, 1 run

items.text: overpitched inswinger on off stump, driven straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, no run

items.text: good length and wide outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, no run

items.text: bouncer dug too short, ducks under it without fuss
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, no run

items.text: back of a length and climbing up as he looks to defend. Looks like a cutter. Hits the sticker of the bat and lobs up momentarily
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, no run

items.text: nicely put away. Another short of a length ball at off stump, this time with consistent bounce. He stands tall and slaps this to the midwicket boundary on the up
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, FOUR runs

items.text: full outside off, leans in and drives to sweeper's right
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Cremer, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, no run

items.text: tossed up on off stump, pushed aerially towards extra cover
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Cremer, no run
